events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your submission carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering group, focusing on backend software development roles.
A dedicated recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to your case and will contact you shortly.
The initial screening of your technical skills and background has been completed successfully by our hiring team.
Thank you for your prompt response to our interview invitation. You have confirmed your availability for the next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare accordingly and confirm your attendance.
You successfully completed the technical interview with strong coding and problem-solving skills demonstrated throughout.
The HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 10 AM UTC to discuss your culture fit and company values alignment.
The HR interview was completed successfully, where your interpersonal skills and team compatibility were very well received.
We are pleased to offer you the position of Software Engineer, including competitive salary and benefits tailored for you.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed your enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
Congratulations! You have accepted our offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a valued member of our software engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with access to necessary tools, introductory materials, and team introductions scheduled.
The recruitment case for the Software Engineer position is now closed successfully with you formally hired and onboarded.
